entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
